BNSF Train #1239 Delayed/Expressing

BNSF train #1239, scheduled to arrive Aurora at 4:35 PM, may be operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule and will express from Berwyn to Clarendon Hills due to freight train interference. Train #1251 will accommodate passengers at intermediate stops.

BNSF #1245 - Operational Change

BNSF train #1245, scheduled to arrive Brookfield at 4:10PM will make additional stops and terminate at LaGrange Road due to earlier freight train interference. Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPN Main Street Elevator Door Out of Service
The Main Street elevator door is out of service.  The Main Street elevator cannot be used at this time.  Customers can use Davis Street or Rogers Park as alternate boarding stations.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
Current Out Of Service Metra Elevators

The following Metra station elevators are out of service: Metra Electric - Michigan and Randolph Elevator. Rock Island - CTA elevator at LaSalle station. Click service alerts for your district to see alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RI CTA Elevator Out of Service
The CTA elevator located by the platform at the LaSalle Street station is out of service. During this time, please utilize the stairs, escalators, and the elevator located on Financial Street.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME Train #328 Operating 20 to 25 Minutes Behind Schedule Due to an Earlier Gate Malfunction

ME train #328 scheduled to arrive Millennium Station at 04:47 PM, may be operating 20 to 25
minutes behind schedule due to an earlier gate malfunction. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
UPW Train #54 - On The Move

UPW train #54 scheduled to arrive Ogilvie Transportation Center at 4:50 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference . Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 87th street/Woodruff Station Closure Beginning December 16 - Station Rebuild Project

The 87th street/Woodruff station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, December 16. During this time passengers can use 83rd and 91st street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, the station will have an enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrance, lobby with an elevator, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage. The station is expected to reopen in late 2025. For more information visit metra.com.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 79th Street/Chatham Station
The 79th Street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric may not be fully ADA accessible Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME -  103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St,/Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-N - Fox Lake Station Platform Closure

Attention Fox Lake Station passengers: The north end of the Fox Lake platform and a section of the north parking lot will be closed until further notice for construction at the depot. Trains will load and unload from the south end of the platform.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-NW - Beginning June 2, 2025, the Pingree Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station construction.

Beginning June 2,2025, the Pingree Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station construction. ADA access will resume late 2025. Passengers requiring full accessibility should use Crystal Lake station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is fully restored.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert SWS - Oak Lawn Platform Rehabilitation (UPDATE)

Beginning Monday, June 30, platform rehabilitation at Oak Lawn Station will begin its final phase. The west half of the platform is closed. Passengers should watch their step as the platform is currently gravel during this process. Please allow additional time to access the in-service portion of the platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-W - Wood Dale Parking Lot Resurfacing Project  - July through August, 2025

The Village of Wood Dale will be resurfacing parking lots 2, 3, and 4. The project will occur in two phases, starting the first week in July through the end of August. Please allow additional time when traveling to the station.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Metra Electric to Operate on a Sunday Schedule - Saturday, July 19
On Saturday, July 19, the Metra Electric line will operate on a Sunday schedule due to construction work associated with the South Shore Line's expansion plans. Please allow additional travel time.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Metra Electric Partial Shut Down Saturday, July 26 and Sunday, July 27 - NICTD Expansion Project

On Saturday, July 26th and Sunday, July 27th, Metra Electric trains will terminate and originate from the 18th Street Station due to the NICTD expansion project. Metra Electric will operate on a Sunday schedule both days. During this time, no service will be available at Museum Campus/11th Street and Van Buren Street stations.

ADA customers and those with mobility needs must transfer at McCormick Place to board a Pace Paratransit vehicle and shuttle to Millennium Station. All other customers wishing to travel to Millennium Station must transfer to a shuttle bus at the 18th Street Station. If you need help or have questions, please see Metra personnel for assistance.

Click here for more details.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert MD-N - Grayland Station Reopening
The Grayland Station will be reopening on August 14. The temporary platform will close on this date. Passengers are directed to use new entrances at N Kilbourn and N Milwaukee.
